P

play() - Method in class ui.Menu
The method waits for a String input from the console, and does something according to said input
if the input is menu, it returns to the menu if the input is num, it calls the method printString from the class ManageBoard if the input is simul, it calls the method simul from the class Menu if the input is help, it prints the possible options the user can choose from if the input is a line jump, it calls for the method actionPlayer from the class ManageBoard if the input is anything else, it asks for a new input pre: The creation of the methods: actionPlayer and printString, from the class ManageBoard and the method simul from the class Menu post: Executes a method depending of the input
Player - Class in model
 
Player(char) - Constructor for class model.Player
The constructor method creates an objet Player
pre: To create a player is needed a char with the icon or the game pice post: Creates an objet player with the icon
Player(char, Player) - Constructor for class model.Player
The constructor method creates an objet Player
pre: To create a player is needed a char with the icon or the game pice and a Player thas is going to be the next post: Creates an objet player with the icon and adds the player next to it
Players - Class in model
 
Players(int) - Constructor for class model.Players
The constructor method creates an objet Players that has an amount of players
pre: To create the objet players is needed the amount of players that are going to be added post: Creates an objet player with a genereated char that is going to be the first, and sets the size to 1
Players(int, String) - Constructor for class model.Players
The constructor method creates an objet Players that has an amount of players
pre: To create the objet players is needed the amount of players that are going to be added and the icons post: Creates an objet player with a given char that is going to be the first, and sets the size to 1
printBoardInGame() - Method in class model.ManageBoard
The method to another that gets the string of the board
pre: the user has to make a line jump that call the method that calls this one post: gets the updated board
printString() - Method in class model.ManageBoard
The method calls the private method printString and gives it the necessary parameters
pre: The creation of the private method printString and at least 1 use of the method createBoard post: Changes and returns the value of the String print
